intro: Blennodia nasturtium, commonly known as the heartleaf nasturtium, is a flowering plant native to South America. It features heart-shaped leaves and produces vibrant yellow or orange flowers. The plant is part of the Tropaeolaceae family and is known for its peppery scent and edible leaves. It thrives in well-drained soil and full sun, making it a popular choice for ornamental gardens. Its botanical characteristics make it both visually appealing and useful in culinary applications.
